Simple Text Editor LinkedList Implementation Testing
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~test_1.txt~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

-Initializing editor
-read( test_1.txt )
===test_1.txt===
123456789
123456789
123456789
123456789
123456789
Size of text : 49
~~~~~

-readWithIterator( test_1.txt )
===test_1.txt===
123456789
123456789
123456789
123456789
123456789
Size of text : 49
~~~~~

-add( 5,"GTU" )
===test_1.txt===
12345GTU6789
123456789
123456789
123456789
123456789
Size of text : 52
~~~~~

-addWithIterator( 18,"CSE" )
===test_1.txt===
12345GTU6789
12345CSE6789
123456789
123456789
123456789
Size of text : 55
~~~~~

-find( "GTU" )
5
===test_1.txt===
12345GTU6789
12345CSE6789
123456789
123456789
123456789
Size of text : 55
~~~~~

-findWithIterator( "CSE" )
18
===test_1.txt===
12345GTU6789
12345CSE6789
123456789
123456789
123456789
Size of text : 55
~~~~~

- replace() , replacing all number character with '_' 
===test_1.txt===
_____GTU____
_____CSE____
_________
_________
_________
Size of text : 55
~~~~~

- replaceWithIterator() , replacing all occurrence of '_' with '*' 
===test_1.txt===
*****GTU****
*****CSE****
*********
*********
*********
Size of text : 55
~~~~~

========END-LinkedList=========

Simple Text Editor ArrayList Implementation Testing
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~test_1.txt~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

-Initializing editor
-read( test_1.txt )
===test_1.txt===
123456789
123456789
123456789
123456789
123456789
Size of text : 49
~~~~~

-readWithIterator( test_1.txt )
===test_1.txt===
123456789
123456789
123456789
123456789
123456789
Size of text : 49
~~~~~

-add( 5,"GTU" )
===test_1.txt===
12345GTU6789
123456789
123456789
123456789
123456789
Size of text : 52
~~~~~

-addWithIterator( 18,"CSE" )
===test_1.txt===
12345GTU6789
12345CSE6789
123456789
123456789
123456789
Size of text : 55
~~~~~

-find( "GTU" )
5
===test_1.txt===
12345GTU6789
12345CSE6789
123456789
123456789
123456789
Size of text : 55
~~~~~

-findWithIterator( "CSE" )
18
===test_1.txt===
12345GTU6789
12345CSE6789
123456789
123456789
123456789
Size of text : 55
~~~~~

- replace() , replacing all number character with '_' 
===test_1.txt===
_____GTU____
_____CSE____
_________
_________
_________
Size of text : 55
~~~~~

- replaceWithIterator() , replacing all occurrence of '_' with '*' 
===test_1.txt===
*****GTU****
*****CSE****
*********
*********
*********
Size of text : 55
~~~~~

========END-ArrayList=========

Simple Text Editor LinkedList Implementation Testing
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~test_2.txt~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

-Initializing editor
-read( test_2.txt )
===test_2.txt===
123456789123456789123456789123456789123456789123456789
123456789123456789123456789123456789123456789123456789
123456789123456789123456789123456789123456789123456789
123456789123456789123456789123456789123456789123456789
123456789123456789123456789123456789123456789123456789
Size of text : 274
~~~~~

-readWithIterator( test_2.txt )
===test_2.txt===
123456789123456789123456789123456789123456789123456789
123456789123456789123456789123456789123456789123456789
123456789123456789123456789123456789123456789123456789
123456789123456789123456789123456789123456789123456789
123456789123456789123456789123456789123456789123456789
Size of text : 274
~~~~~

-add( 5,"GTU" )
===test_2.txt===
12345GTU6789123456789123456789123456789123456789123456789
123456789123456789123456789123456789123456789123456789
123456789123456789123456789123456789123456789123456789
123456789123456789123456789123456789123456789123456789
123456789123456789123456789123456789123456789123456789
Size of text : 277
~~~~~

-addWithIterator( 18,"CSE" )
===test_2.txt===
12345GTU6789123456CSE789123456789123456789123456789123456789
123456789123456789123456789123456789123456789123456789
123456789123456789123456789123456789123456789123456789
123456789123456789123456789123456789123456789123456789
123456789123456789123456789123456789123456789123456789
Size of text : 280
~~~~~

-find( "GTU" )
5
===test_2.txt===
12345GTU6789123456CSE789123456789123456789123456789123456789
123456789123456789123456789123456789123456789123456789
123456789123456789123456789123456789123456789123456789
123456789123456789123456789123456789123456789123456789
123456789123456789123456789123456789123456789123456789
Size of text : 280
~~~~~

-findWithIterator( "CSE" )
18
===test_2.txt===
12345GTU6789123456CSE789123456789123456789123456789123456789
123456789123456789123456789123456789123456789123456789
123456789123456789123456789123456789123456789123456789
123456789123456789123456789123456789123456789123456789
123456789123456789123456789123456789123456789123456789
Size of text : 280
~~~~~

- replace() , replacing all number character with '_' 
===test_2.txt===
_____GTU__________CSE_______________________________________
______________________________________________________
______________________________________________________
______________________________________________________
______________________________________________________
Size of text : 280
~~~~~

- replaceWithIterator() , replacing all occurrence of '_' with '*' 
===test_2.txt===
*****GTU**********CSE***************************************
******************************************************
******************************************************
******************************************************
******************************************************
Size of text : 280
~~~~~

========END-LinkedList=========

Simple Text Editor ArrayList Implementation Testing
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~test_2.txt~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

-Initializing editor
-read( test_2.txt )
===test_2.txt===
123456789123456789123456789123456789123456789123456789
123456789123456789123456789123456789123456789123456789
123456789123456789123456789123456789123456789123456789
123456789123456789123456789123456789123456789123456789
123456789123456789123456789123456789123456789123456789
Size of text : 274
~~~~~

-readWithIterator( test_2.txt )
===test_2.txt===
123456789123456789123456789123456789123456789123456789
123456789123456789123456789123456789123456789123456789
123456789123456789123456789123456789123456789123456789
123456789123456789123456789123456789123456789123456789
123456789123456789123456789123456789123456789123456789
Size of text : 274
~~~~~

-add( 5,"GTU" )
===test_2.txt===
12345GTU6789123456789123456789123456789123456789123456789
123456789123456789123456789123456789123456789123456789
123456789123456789123456789123456789123456789123456789
123456789123456789123456789123456789123456789123456789
123456789123456789123456789123456789123456789123456789
Size of text : 277
~~~~~

-addWithIterator( 18,"CSE" )
===test_2.txt===
12345GTU6789123456CSE789123456789123456789123456789123456789
123456789123456789123456789123456789123456789123456789
123456789123456789123456789123456789123456789123456789
123456789123456789123456789123456789123456789123456789
123456789123456789123456789123456789123456789123456789
Size of text : 280
~~~~~

-find( "GTU" )
5
===test_2.txt===
12345GTU6789123456CSE789123456789123456789123456789123456789
123456789123456789123456789123456789123456789123456789
123456789123456789123456789123456789123456789123456789
123456789123456789123456789123456789123456789123456789
123456789123456789123456789123456789123456789123456789
Size of text : 280
~~~~~

-findWithIterator( "CSE" )
18
===test_2.txt===
12345GTU6789123456CSE789123456789123456789123456789123456789
123456789123456789123456789123456789123456789123456789
123456789123456789123456789123456789123456789123456789
123456789123456789123456789123456789123456789123456789
123456789123456789123456789123456789123456789123456789
Size of text : 280
~~~~~

- replace() , replacing all number character with '_' 
===test_2.txt===
_____GTU__________CSE_______________________________________
______________________________________________________
______________________________________________________
______________________________________________________
______________________________________________________
Size of text : 280
~~~~~

- replaceWithIterator() , replacing all occurrence of '_' with '*' 
===test_2.txt===
*****GTU**********CSE***************************************
******************************************************
******************************************************
******************************************************
******************************************************
Size of text : 280
~~~~~

========END-ArrayList=========
